title: Great American Growth Story of Cannabis
itunes:title: Great American Growth Story of Cannabis
description:
Kim Rivers, CEO of Trulieve, discusses second quarter earnings and the burgeoning adult-use cannabis business.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
